3f1e12b7-2055-461c-8cc9-7c3698cd5346.description: A Future Ready Pathways Coach is skilled at supporting individuals to unpack and understand their Future Ready Pathways Report, identify and reflect on their key human capability strengths and use the report to help make informed decisions about the occupations that will give them the best opportunity to realise their potential.
3f1e12b7-2055-461c-8cc9-7c3698cd5346.name: Future Ready Pathways Coach

alignments.name: Human Capability Standards
alignments.description: The Human Capability Standards identify the non-technical worker and leadership capabilities that are most important in future job profiles. The standards are based on 25 years of international scientific and applied research with over 50 ASX50 and Forbes500 organisations

badge_template_activities.title: Future Ready Pathway Coaches are experienced managers, career advisors, coaches, people and culture specialists or certified psychologists.

Completion of the Capability.Co Future Ready Pathways Coach Certification Program including debriefing results with individuals, and preparing individuals for career and personal development planning based on their Future Ready Pathways results.

52c0b317-23a3-461d-8722-ed81f802b081.description: Earners of the Agile & Innovative - Advanced micro-credential can enhance an organisation’s capacity to respond quickly to strategic challenges and opportunities. This includes maintaining a curious mindset, suspending criticism as a default, and asking questions to understand, examining assumptions, taking calculated risks, and experimenting. They take a strategic end to end view of value creation, monitors the external environment, encourages disruption and seizes opportunities to innovate.
52c0b317-23a3-461d-8722-ed81f802b081.name: Agile & Innovative - Mastery

01128e0b-b9b3-4f16-8eef-ca6235fa89ee.description: Earners of the Collaboration - Mastery micro-credential can work collaboratively with all types of people, contribute to teamwork and to build relationships and networks across a range of people or groups. ac15e4cf-f022-4cc2-a00f-5ee27c2ed583.description: Earners of the Ethics - Mastery micro-credential can act with integrity and in conformance with social and professional standards of ethical conduct. They promote effective organisational governance and compliance management systems, seek and actively respond to external review of organisational governance and compliance audits, and promotes compatible ethical practices and professional standards across the industry with strategic partners.
ac15e4cf-f022-4cc2-a00f-5ee27c2ed583.name: Ethics - Mastery

alignments.name: Institute of Working Futures Human Capability Standards
alignments.description: The Human Capability Standards identify the non-technical worker and leadership capabilities that are most important in future job profiles. The standards are based on over 25 years of international scientific and applied research with over 50 ASX50 and Forbes500 organisations.

alignments.name: University Pathway
alignments.description: Select Universities recognise Capability.Co micro-credentials for advanced standing or credit into accredited undergraduate and postgraduate program. Entry will be subject to satisfying any other stated course admission requirements set by the University

badge_template_activities.title: Provided a reflection, artefacts and evidence on knowledge, relationships and experience that demonstrated the capability in action within a work setting.
Successfully proved capability through an interview reflecting on their knowledge and experience, assessed and confirmed by an external, fully qualified assessor panel.

c02f07d6-6e44-4c99-b89c-4d17b964c8b2.description: A Future Ready Pathways Coach is skilled at supporting individuals to unpack and understand their Future Ready Pathways Report, identify and reflect on their key human capability strengths and use the report to help make informed decisions about the occupations that will give them the best opportunity to realise their potential.
c02f07d6-6e44-4c99-b89c-4d17b964c8b2.name: Future Ready Profile Coach

alignments.name: Human Capability Standards
alignments.description: The Human Capability Standards identify the non-technical worker and leadership capabilities that are most important in future job profiles. The standards are based on 25 years of international scientific and applied research with over 50 ASX50 and Forbes500 organisations

badge_template_activities.title: Future Ready Profile Coaches are experienced managers, career advisors, coaches, people and culture specialists or certified psychologists.

Completion of the Capability.Co Future Ready Profile Coach Certification Program including debriefing results with individuals, and preparing individuals for career and personal development planning based on their Future Ready Profile results.

f05bb3ab-1bf9-4db4-9a11-98d651ce84c3.description: A Future Ready Profile & Pathways Coach is skilled at supporting individuals to unpack and understand the Future Ready Profile Report or Future Ready Pathways Report, identify and reflect on their key human capability strengths and use the report to help make informed decisions about the occupations that will give them the best opportunity to realise their potential, their development and career.
f05bb3ab-1bf9-4db4-9a11-98d651ce84c3.name: Future Ready Profile & Pathways Coach

alignments.name: Human Capability Standards
alignments.description: The Human Capability Standards identify the non-technical worker and leadership capabilities that are most important in future job profiles. The standards are based on 25 years of international scientific and applied research with over 50 ASX50 and Forbes500 organisations

badge_template_activities.title: Future Ready Profile & Pathways Coaches are experienced managers, career advisors, coaches, people and culture specialists or certified psychologists.

Completion of the Capability.Co Future Ready Coach Certification Program including debriefing results with individuals, and preparing individuals for career and personal development planning based on their Future Ready Profile results.

9d701b4c-9052-4ff3-8a7e-c5df90e35ab2.description: Earners of the Leadership - Advanced micro-credential can lead transformational processes, motivate staff and build an environment of mutual trust and commitment to deliver the outcomes required now and into the future. They mobilise support for initiatives that impact strategy and direction, establishes systems and processes to identify talent, represents the organisation with sensitivity and awareness of global trends, and motivates and inspires by conveying a compelling vision.
9d701b4c-9052-4ff3-8a7e-c5df90e35ab2.name: Leadership - Advanced

d476f0ec-dbd7-4f28-be20-fef3093c8e9f.description: Earners of the Leadership - Foundation micro-credential can lead transformational processes, motivate staff and build an environment of mutual trust and commitment to deliver the outcomes required now and into the future. They encourage individuals to share ideas and question existing practices, sets a clear vision and sense of shared direction, motivates others, creates an open and trusting work environment, fosters capability growth, and sets appropriate behaviour for self and the team.

17da546c-8150-414b-bdad-61108084eeeb.description: Earners of the Problem Solving & Data - Advanced micro-credential can use data to define and analyse problems, generate optimal solutions and make recommendations. They use identify multiple chains of complex cause and effect, maps complex process, uses data to predict problems and uncertainties in the environment and classify problems, harnesses analytical techniques, and anticipates and resolves problems before they adversely impact.
17da546c-8150-414b-bdad-61108084eeeb.name: Problem Solving & Data - Advanced

ff0c23a5-faf9-4e0c-a959-9aae8ee7437e.description: Earners of the Problem Solving & Data - Foundation micro-credential can use data to define and analyse problems, generate optimal solutions and make recommendations. They use tools and techniques to anticipate and analyse problems, identify causal factors, monitors data to anticipate and resolve problems, integrates information from diverse sources, identifies and removes root causes to problems, and monitors and evaluates implemented solutions.

7d2e9660-8fe5-40c2-8939-ed56a6c07135.description: Earners of the Problem Solving & Data - Mastery Micro-Credential can use data to define and analyse problems, generate optimal solutions and make recommendations. 7d2e9660-8fe5-40c2-8939-ed56a6c07135.name: Problem Solving & Data - Mastery
